content.raw:
Protobuf3 messages should be treated as C-structs. So, all values will be set regardless of whether or not you called `set_` on the variable.

This is different from proto2, but I don't think there is anything we should do to bypass the protobuf3 usage philosophy. We just have to make sure to set all values that we care about for each message.

This is different from proto2, but I don't think there is anything we should do to bypass the protobuf3 usage philosophy. We just have to make sure to set all values that we care about for each message.
